examples.example: 只要我们坚持不懈地努力，就一定能做到自己想要达成的目标。

translate.english: As long as we persevere in our efforts, we will surely be able to achieve the goals we want to achieve.

examples.example: 我相信通过不断地学习和实践，我们一定能够做到最好。

translate.english: I believe that through continuous learning and practice, we will definitely be able to do the best.

examples.example: 我一定会全力以赴做到自己许下的承诺。

translate.english: I will definitely go all out to fulfill the promise I have made.
